entry.em: ..WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY

entry.data:
CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW THIS MORNING
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 12
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 7 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND ZERO
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 20

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
